verses.roman:
bhaṭṭācārye āliṅgiyā tāṅhāre kahila
'tomāra prasāde āmi eta sukha pāila'

synonyms: bhaṭṭācārye—Balabhadra Bhaṭṭācārya; āliṅgiyā—embracing; tāṅhāre—unto him; kahila—said; tomāra prasāde—by your kindness; āmi—I; eta—so much; sukha—happiness; pāila—got.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu then embraced Balabhadra Bhaṭṭācārya and told him, "It is only by your kindness that I am now so happy."
